price: Emwe bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo! Enda rero nyabuna nimwiyubare ibihano vy'Imana Allah mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yayo, maze umwe wese muri mwebwe, arabe ico yakoze kizomufasha mu buzima bw'inyuma yo gupfa. Nimutinye rero Imana Allah mu vyo mukora vyose. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, ni Yo Muhetuziwavyose, Irazi neza ivyo mukora, kandi Izobibahembera.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waltanẓur nafsun mā qaddamat lighadin wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
